Description: Online hosted CRM system for individuals, small businesses and sales teams wanting a simple, effective and affordable solution.
Name: Capsule

Methods.Name: Get Users
Methods.Description: This method allows you to get the details of all users.

Methods.Name: List Employees
Methods.Description: This method allows you to get a list of People in an organisation.

Methods.Name: Get Updated Opportunities
Methods.Description: This method allows you to get the details of all Opportunities that have been updated since last run.

Methods.Name: Get Opportunities
Methods.Description: This method allows you to get the details of all Opportunities.

Methods.Name: Update Opportunity
Methods.Description: This method allows you to update a opportunities.

Methods.Name: Delete Opportunity
Methods.Description: This method allows you to delete a Opportunity.

Methods.Name: Get Opportunity
Methods.Description: This method allows you to get the details of a single Opportunity.

Methods.Name: Create Opportunity
Methods.Description: This method allows you to add a Opportunity.

Methods.Name: Get Organisation
Methods.Description: This method allows you to get the details of a single organisation.

Methods.Name: Get Organisations
Methods.Description: This method allows you to get the details of all organisations.

Methods.Description: This method allows you to get the details of all organisations that have been updated since last run.

Methods.Description: This method allows you to add a organisation.

Methods.Name: Update Organisation
Methods.Description: This method allows you to update a organisations.

Methods.Name: Delete Organisation
Methods.Description: This method allows you to delete a organisation.

Methods.Name: List Organisation Custom Fields
Methods.Description: Gets the custom field definitions for organisations.

Methods.Name: Get Contact
Methods.Description: This method allows you to get the details of a single contact.

Methods.Name: Get Updated Contacts With Email Addresses
Methods.Description: This method gets contacts that have been updated since the last run and have at least one email address.  For each email address, a separate contact is returned.

Methods.Name: Get Updated Contacts
Methods.Description: This method allows you to get the details of all contacts who have been updated since the last run.

Methods.Name: Delete Contact
Methods.Description: This method allows you to delete a contact.

Methods.Name: Get Contacts
Methods.Description: This method allows you to get the details of all contacts.

Methods.Name: Get Contacts By Email Address
Methods.Description: This method gets contacts that have a matching email address.

Methods.Name: Get Contacts With Email Addresses
Methods.Description: This method gets contacts that have at least one email address.  For each email address, a separate contact is returned.

Methods.Name: Create Contact
Methods.Description: This method allows you to add a contact.

Methods.Name: Update contact
Methods.Description: This method allows you to update a contact.

Methods.Name: List Contact Custom Fields
Methods.Description: Gets the custom field definitions for the parties contact.

Methods.Name: Get Contacts By Email (BETA - DO NOT USE)
Methods.Description: This method gets contacts that have a matching email address.

Methods.Name: Get Tasks
Methods.Description: This method allows you to get the details of all Tasks.

Methods.Name: List Deleted Parties
Methods.Description: This method allows you to get the details of all deleted Parties.

Methods.Description: This method allows you to get the details of all Parties that have been updated since the last run.

Methods.Description: This method allows you to get the details of all Parties.

Methods.Description: This method allows you to get the details of all Parties deleted since the last run.

Methods.Description: This method allows you to get the details of parties custom fields.

MetaTile: Integrate Capsule CRM - CRM & Marketing Automation - Cyclr
MetaDescription: Sync your Capsule CRM to your business applications and build your own automation workflows with Cyclr's drag and drop builder.
